course.subject: PHYS
course.name: Physics Seminar and Tutorial I
course.description: Appropriate seminars and small group tutorials are scheduled to expose students to a variety of issues in science and society, and to enhance students' communication with faculties and among themselves. For Physics students in their second year of study under the four-year degree only. Graded P or F.

reviews.author: 日修運動服愛好者
reviews.comment_content:
Meet you mentor

Welcome Lunch for New Physics Students (At China Gardens (南北小廚))

Presentation Skills (By video recording)

Case Study Seminar --- Nuclear Energy

Library Session --- Effective Scientific Literature Search and Reference Management

Career Story Sharing by Alumnus: From Physics to Entrepreneurship By Woody Tong, Founder & CEO, CoDeco Technology Limited (好師傅)

Post-Graduate Study in HKUST and PG Students Sharing

How Physics Profession Navigating Career Paths in Commercial World: Insights and Perspectives By Mr. Leo Li, Vice President Head of Partner Business Solution Asia Pacific, American Express

UG Forum about teaching of Phys courses

Summer Internship Sharing

Group Presentation of a Science topic (2-3 people)

Award Ceremony and Photo-Taking (5 awards are awarded for both 2080 and 4080)
reviews.comment_teaching:
No lessons

Just go to the LTB every Friday at 12:30pm for satisfy the course requirements (except welcome dinner , library workshop and presentations, you go to a different place for attendance)
reviews.comment_grading:
Only Pass and Fail

Your grade in this course will be based on your attendance and performance in the presentation

For PHYS2080, students will form groups of 2-3 people and prepare a group presentation. This is to train students' communication and teamwork skills. Each group will pick a science topic and give a group presentation.
reviews.comment_workload: You just only need to form groups of 2 -3 people for a 15 min presentation to fufill the course requirements with your mentor.

reviews.author: MUZI
reviews.title: Taking attendance is all about this course.
reviews.comment_content: No exam, no homework. You don't have to worry about this course. This is kind of break time. At the end of the course, you may take a photo with physics faculty members including PHYS 2080 students.
reviews.comment_teaching: It's such a long time ago, I don't remember at all, which means there are no such important stuff to remember.
reviews.comment_grading: This course worth only 1 credit, and there are only pass or fail. Taking all attendance would be enough for getting pass.
reviews.comment_workload: I have nothing to advice you. just attend the lectures.

reviews.comment_content: 所有physics major既同學既"scie1000", 幾乎每星期都要上，有時係見下faculty mentor，有時係聽下talk，最後2堂分別係影張group photos同頒獎。
reviews.comment_teaching: 都幾無聊下。無咩特別學到。
reviews.comment_grading: pass or fail...不清楚怎樣才fail.......
reviews.comment_workload: 學期中每人都有一次presentation, present關於physics既topic(depend on 你既mentor)...基本上隨便準備下就好了，應該好難fail......
